backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, package management, subscribers, and monthly billing state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing Arabic localization, RTL support, and month-name localization with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and base resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configured for Arabic language and RTL direction with root mount and script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication flow, profile setup, header, navigation, and page routing with Arabic UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login screen prompting unauthenticated users with Arabic text and Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Auth button handling login/logout with error recovery and Arabic labels.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting firstâ€‘time users to save name and phone with Arabic labels and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating an actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state, identity loading, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on user profiles, packages, subscribers, and billing data through the actor interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with light and dark theme variables plus RTL and utility styles.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Utility functions for formatting USD currency values and converting numbers to bigint.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Includes helpers to validate, sanitize, and open WhatsApp phone links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/BillingPage.tsx: Billing management UI showing subscribers, package prices, and monthly due/paid toggles with backend updates.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard that displays monthly and yearly billing totals with selectable date filters.
frontend/src/pages/SubscribersPage.tsx: React page for listing, searching, creating, and editing subscribers with dialog-based forms and integration with subscriber/package APIs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Arabic localization initiative, existing features, and pending requirements.
